ygData.subject: Re: Locations of metal and molds
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the bad quoting, but the way you formatted the original text messes up my mail client in replies.  :)  Nevertheless... ... Ore Windmills in Steamfont
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the bad quoting, but the way you formatted the original text
messes up my mail client in replies. :) Nevertheless...

At 14:15 6/30/99 -0400, you wrote:
>
>Hello fellow smiths. Here is my list so far:
Ore
Windmills in Steamfont
>Shadowknight guild, Grobb
>The weapon shop in North Freeport
>Somewhere in Highpass Hold (details requested here)

You go straight into the hold, you'll come into a room with many doors,
it's on the wall opposite the way you'll be facing, but it's on the other
end of the room. Follow the path of archways with no doors (you don't have
to click on anything.) You'll go down a ramp, and around one corner is the
bank, and the other corner is the ore vendor. This makes more sense when
you're there than when reading what I'm typing.

Small Molds
Misty Thicket, near Rivervale
>Butcherblock Mountains, near Kaladim

Medium Molds
East Freeport, Armor by Ikthar
>Kelethin, main lift platform

Qeynos Hills, Martno Sayer in the cottage

Large Molds
The "two tents" area of Everfrost,
>near Halas

Western Plains of Karana. Near the western edge of the zone, follow the
road south, past the "evil" guard tower, there is a barbarian fishing
village thing. A guy there sells them.

Sheet Metal
Mold vendor in Kelethin
>Mold vendor in East Freeport

Also at Marton Sayer, in the cottage in Qeynos Hills

This is an important resource for smiths, I
>believe, so if you know of some that I have missed, please send them here.
>Jyzan
